text:
Current child samples can be included in the scope for a Response Assertion. (As per https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=45258) but where there are multiple sub samples then the assertion will fail if it does not match ALL on each child.

It would be beneficial to have an option to return success if one or more children match. Or, simply an option to return success if a match is found anywhere, in the main sample or sub samples.
